name: ThreeMinuteGrandparent
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

des: The Three Minute Grandparent shares life experiences and humor from a real Grandpa. We explore the humorous and not so humorous sides of a life filled with meaning and purpose.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
